title: Allison Williams Marries Ricky Van Veen
content: Allison Williams is a married woman! The Girls star tied the knot with her longtime boyfriend, College Humor co-founder Ricky Van Veen, at a picturesque ranch out west this weekend,  Us Weekly reports. Wedding guests included Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson , who plays Williams' mother on the HBO show, as well as Katy Perry , John Mayer , Bruce Springsteen , and Girls creator Lena Dunham . Williams, 27, and Van Veen, 34, had been dating for three years when they announced their engagement back in February. Judging by a photo Williams posted on Instagram late Saturday, she had the kind of ceremony Marnie would dream of: Other Links From TVGuide.com
